Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model

Class Player

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a player in the game.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • selectObjectiveCard

      public boolean selectObjectiveCard(int index, Game game)
      Method for making the player choose his Objective card.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card the player wants to keep.
      game - The game.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful or not.

    • checkSkipTurn

      public void checkSkipTurn()
      Method to check if the player can no longer place cards in his Codex. If the player can no longer place cards, he skips his turns until the end of the game.

    • calculatePointObjective

      public void calculatePointObjective(Desk desk)
